entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
